snippet.title: Cuddly Forest Friends - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Cuddly Forest Friends is a simulation game where you care for your furry friends so that they may reach their full potential. Keep them fed and content and cheer them on while they gather items from the forest to craft decor and apparel. Play a variety of minigames with your animal friends like fishing, racing, rhythmic games, and more. Cuddly Forest Friends is available now on Nintendo Switch.
